attributes.action: Leave EU with no deal on 29th March 2019
attributes.additional_details: After days of debate MPs have decisively rejected Prime Minister Theresa May's Brexit deal by 432 votes to 202. Nearly 120 Conservative MPs voted against their leader.
attributes.background: A referendum Thursday 23 June, 2016, to decide whether the UK should leave or remain in the European Union. Leave won by 51.9% to 48.1%. The referendum turnout was 71.8%, with more than 30 million people voting.
